headline: Has Duke Energy’s Long Runway Left Much Upside After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: Wondering if Duke Energy is still a solid value play after its long run, or if most of the upside has already been priced in? This article will walk through that question in plain language. The stock has slipped recently, down 3.9% over the last week and 7.3% over the last month, but it is still up 5.7% year to date and has delivered 53.1% over 5 years, which suggests the longer term trend is intact. Recent moves in utilities, including Duke Energy, have been shaped by shifting expectations...
